result.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ صَدَّقَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ إِبۡلِيسُ ظَنَّهُۥ فَٱتَّبَعُوهُ إِلَّا فَرِيقٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
result.translation: Satan found his assumption[15] about them[16] to be true, for they followed him, except for a group of the believers,
result.footnotes:
[15] That he would be able to mislead them.
 [16] i.e., the people of Sheba or humankind in general.
